tool_description: Calculates current and future planetary transits to natal chart positions for timing and forecasting analysis.

transit_orb.description: Orb tolerance for transit aspects (1-5 degrees).

include_outer_planets.description: Whether to include Uranus, Neptune, Pluto transits.

error_messages: Invalid natal positions: Must provide 8-15 longitude values between 0-360 degrees.
Invalid target date: Use ISO 8601 date-time format.
Invalid orb tolerance: Must be between 1 and 5 degrees.
Date out of range: Target date must be within reasonable astronomical calculation range.
usage: Provide natal planetary positions and target date, set orb tolerance and outer planet preferences to calculate active transits.
